nodes.text: Ronn Blythe was a human male who lived during the High Republic Era. Born around 245 BBY, he was the son of Ottoh and Erika Blythe, and the older brother of Bailen. Along with his family, Ronn was kidnapped from their homestead on Elphrona by Nihil pirates after the Great Hyperspace Disaster in an attempt to ransom them to wealthy relatives on Alderaan.
